news.title: Dutch House of Representatives advances controversial 36% tax law
news.titleOriginal: Dutch House of Representatives advances controversial 36% tax law
news.summary: Certain assets, like equity in a qualifying start-up company and physical property used for non-investment, were exempt from the 36% tax.

news.title: Digital gold or tech stock? Bitcoin’s identity crisis deepens
news.titleOriginal: Digital gold or tech stock? Bitcoin’s identity crisis deepens
news.summary: Bitcoin’s growing correlation with tech stocks challenges its digital gold narrative, as Ether treasuries, BlackRock and Polymarket make bold moves.

news.title: Bitcoin bulls blitz $69K as retail traders pressure short positioning
news.titleOriginal: Bitcoin bulls blitz $69K as retail traders pressure short positioning
news.summary: Bitcoin rallies above $69,000 as retail traders apply pressure to short positions and aim to generate a lasting bullish trend change.

news.title: BlackRock enters DeFi as institutional crypto push accelerates: Finance Redefined
news.titleOriginal: BlackRock enters DeFi as institutional crypto push accelerates: Finance Redefined
news.summary: Bitcoin and Ether rebounded modestly as ETF outflows mounted, while BlackRock entered DeFi and Binance completed its $1 billion Bitcoin reserve shift.

news.title: Anchorage, Kamino let institutions borrow against SOL without moving custody
news.titleOriginal: Anchorage, Kamino let institutions borrow against SOL without moving custody
news.summary: A new framework allows institutions to borrow against staked SOL while the assets remain in qualified custody, as US lawmakers debate DeFi oversight.
